dublin_core.dcvalue: Weekly delivery of stage-based SMS or mini-skit voice messages to improve MNCH through D.Net's revenue-generating and "freemium" model
Brooke Cutler, Senior Program Manager, MAMA | Tel: +1-202-650-5353, Email: bcutler@mobilemamaalliance.org
USAID, Johnson & Johnson, BabyCenter, United Nations Foundation, mHealth Alliance
Client education and behavior change communication, Maternal health, Child health, Newborn health, Sexual and reproductive health
